positive.content:
Andy: Outstanding work on completing this monumental task! Your dedication and perseverance have truly paid off, and I hope you are thrilled with the final result.

The primary goal of FoAW was to familiarize you with the intricacies of academic professionals through trying out extended research and writing. While many of us may still not feel like experts, I know that you have developed your skills and are now better prepared for rigorous academic writing in the future.

I look forward to reading your publications in the coming years. ;)

For feedback,
(1) read the rubric on Canvas carefully,
(2) read my comments below regarding the paper as well as the annotations in your Canvas submission. Learn how to see it here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0xFui6wsfZ4

I recommend taking some time to reflect on this feedback and to identify some key skills/areas that you need to develop moving forward. Thanks for your efforts this semester!
